# Changelog

## [0.2.0] - 2025-XX-XX
### Added
- New utility functions for general-purpose usage.
- UI utility helpers focused on Flet-based applications.

### Changed
- Improved internal project structure.
- Better separation of concerns between core logic and UI helpers.

### Notes
- This release focuses on architecture and developer experience.
- API may still evolve until version 1.0.0.
